description: Breaking all the rules, the ABOVE THE LAW™ pant doubles down on durability while still maintaining flexibility and comfort. Our heavyweight cotton weave features an extra layer of waxed overlays where you need them most. Articulated for superior mobility and vented to release body heat, this premium work pant delivers the perfect fit for any job.
name: Kuhl Above The Law Pants, 32" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: two front hand, one coin, two stealth cargo, two back, one stealth cell phone, and one 3D gusseted pocket with zipper
